name: Alice the Wanderer

skills.name: Vorpal Sword
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target has any active skills on cooldown. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn.
skills.notes: Extra hit triggers if target has any skill on cooldown. Each hit can reduce buff duration.

skills.name: Clockwork Cyclone
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of increasing the cooldowns of all enemy skills by 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of decreasing the target’s Turn Meter by 15%. If at least one of a target’s skills has its cooldown increased to the max, decreases their Turn Meter by 30% instead.
skills.notes: Turn Meter reduction is doubled if skill cooldown is maxed.

skills.name: Queenslayer
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 20% of the target’s DEF. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP. Will also ignore 20% of the target’s DEF.
skills.notes: If first target is killed, chains to lowest HP enemy. Both hits ignore 20% DEF.

skills.name: Tick Tock
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Whenever this Champion attacks, inflicts 3% bonus damage to each target for each turn remaining on all of their skill’s cooldowns. [Active Effect] Resets the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills each time they kill an enemy. Occurs once per skill.
skills.notes: Synergizes with A2 for bonus damage. Kill resets one skill cooldown (once per skill).

forms.aura: Increases Ally ATK in All Battles by 30%
forms.comments: Strong control and nuker. Excels in Arena and Doom Tower.

mechanics_advisory: Best used as a nuker and control champion. Synergizes with cooldown manipulation teams. Passive bonus damage is maximized when enemy skills are on cooldown.
